meanings.definition: Larvae of a small white butterfly that feed on cabbage plants.
meanings.sent1: The cabbageworms were munching on the cabbage leaves.
meanings.sent2: Farmers need to protect their cabbage from cabbageworms.
meanings.sent3: The cabbageworms were having a feast in the cabbage patch.
meanings.sent4: The cabbageworms transformed the green cabbage into holey lace.
meanings.sent5: The cabbageworms wriggled happily among the cabbage heads.
